QuestData.Title: The Exile
QuestData.Description: What is there to say, stranger?$B$BI fought Jung Duk and lost. I was the fool to believe he would fight fairly.$B$BNow, my own brothers turned against me, and here I am, speaking to our enemies.$B$BI know you have come for Osul blood.$B$BI only ask that you hunt down the three who betrayed me.$B$BUrang, who poisoned my drink. Ku-Tong, who bent my spear. And Battat, whose dagger slipped into my side as my victory was assured.$B$BDo this, and I can die in peace.
QuestData.CompletionText: How could they have betrayed me? They were once my brothers!$B$BWhy did they turn on me? WHY?$B$BI hate them! I will slaughter them all!
QuestData.RewardText: It pleases me to know those cowards died at your hands.$B$BPerhaps now, this burning tide in my heart will ebb.
